title: Delicate Diamond Bangles - Modern Vanki (కడియం)
materials: G Color). Features a lustrous Hyderabadi polish for enhanced shine and durability.
features: A contemporary twist on the traditional Vanki (armlet) design. These bangles feature a delicate string of brilliant cut diamonds, prong-set in 18K yellow gold. The open design allows for comfortable wear and a modern aesthetic, perfect for the discerning woman.
occasions: or as a sophisticated gift for a loved one. These bangles add a touch of elegance to any ensemble.
description: These bangles offer a modern take on traditional South Indian jewelry. Crafted with high-quality diamonds and 18K gold, they showcase exceptional craftsmanship and timeless appeal. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and the design makes them a versatile piece for any occasion.
